Summary A Staff IC Packaging Engineer with an MS degree and 10+ years of semiconductor industry experience in the areas of IC package development and innovation. Experienced in Flip Chip and wirebond high pin count BGA/LGA packages including multiple die stacking (5 die stack), Package on Package (POP MLP) with Embedded MLCC passives, Folded CSP using flex core substrate, Untra thin CSP die stacking using 3 mil die thickness and PBGA packages. Specialties:High Performance Packages with high speed memory interface.
